body.p:
City of Pittsburgh.
County of Alligheny
State of Pennsylvania } SS

Before me the subscriber. A. Nicholson came Robert Arthurs who being duly sworn according to law says that as a Commissioner of deeds &c of the the State of Kentucky commissioned by the Governor of said State on the 18th day of February A. D. 1862 -- he will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his Station as such --
Sworn and Subscribed before me an Alderman in and for said City and for said County on this 21st day of Feb;y A. D. 1862

Pennsylvania
Oath of Robt. Arthurs
Comr. of Deeds
filed Feby 24 1862
